relation: Referred to the committee on Children, Families and Persons with Disabilities
Hearing scheduled for 02/14/2012 from 10:30 AM-01:00 PM in A-2
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the House committee on Ways and Means
title: Actions for Bill H.2671
textBeforeTable: “, except as applies to social service agencies and programs which receive state funds who must become handicapped accessible within 5 years of the date of passage of this bill.” Section 13A of chapter 22 of the General Laws, as appearing in the 2008 Official Edition, is hereby amended by inserting after the word “regulation” on line 96, the following:- Miscellaneous Bill History Bill Text Print Preview Download PDF View Formatted Document Download text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means Status: Cheryl A.
